name: Papyrus Run
description:
Currently only on the Google Play Store!

An extremely fun and addicting game that consists of just tapping your screen!

Tap the screen to dodge countless of enemies raining down from the sky.

How did they get there? I don't know, but what I do know is that there's not just hostile creatures raining down....

Includes 4 different enemies!
8 levels of difficulty to predict and overcome!
30+ hats to purchase and customize your character to show off!
